name: Desert Bird Shooting Hunting Game 2018
description:
The hunting season 2018 starts with Desert Birds hunting. This is the time to experience shooting birds in desert and have full fun with your free game. We bring you the best hunting game of the year.

As soon as you play the game you'll become the real hunter that you've dreams about. Game is full of bird species from Blue Jay to Crows. Snipe your way down the game and kill as many birds in as little time as possible to unlock new levels. With upto 10 levels you can complete your appetite for hunting birds. You have to aim and take the perfect shots in time.
Features
-HD Graphics
-Multiple Levels to unlock
-Friedly UI to help you
-Birds with good Animations
-Action and Adventure
-Locate birds with Radar(Map)

How To Play
-Touch and rotate the screen to look around
-Use the scope to zoom on target
-Use the fire button to 'FIRE'
